title: Perspective Agricultural Extension: Practice makes perfect

tasks.task: Develop practical teaching methods for agricultural extension students.
subtasks: Arrange for students to reside in villages temporarily.
Expose students to rural livelihoods and lifestyles.

tasks.task: Implement the Agricultural Development-Led Industrialization strategy.
subtasks: Train employees in rural development and agricultural extension.
Foster skilled and competent human resources.

tasks.task: Enhance food security through agricultural development policies.
subtasks: Support the Agricultural Development-Led Industrialization strategy.
